Class UserModel

java.lang.Object
com.sc2002.model.UserModel
Direct Known Subclasses:
ApplicantModel, HDBManagerModel
public abstract class UserModel extends Object
Abstract base class representing a user within the BTO Management System. This class encapsulates common attributes and behaviors shared by all user types (Applicant, HDB Officer, HDB Manager). It serves as a foundation for specific user roles, promoting code reuse and polymorphism. Utilizes abstraction for role-specific functionalities like menu options.

  • Field Details

    • usersRole

      private UserRole usersRole
      The role assigned to the user (e.g., APPLICANT, HDB_OFFICER, HDB_MANAGER). Determines the user's permissions and available actions within the system.

    • projectViewFilter

      private ProjectViewFilterModel projectViewFilter
      Encapsulates the user's preferences for filtering project views. Allows maintaining filter state specific to each user instance.

    • nric

      private String nric
      The user's unique NRIC number. Used for identification and login.

    • name

      private String name
      The full name of the user.

    • age

      private int age
      The age of the user. Relevant for eligibility checks (e.g., BTO application).

    • isMarried

      private boolean isMarried
      The user's marital status (true for married, false for single/divorced/widowed). Relevant for BTO application eligibility and flat type restrictions.

    • password

      private String password
      The securely hashed password for user authentication. Plain text passwords are never stored.

    • nextUserID

      private static int nextUserID
      Static counter to generate unique user IDs sequentially. Ensures each user instance has a distinct identifier.

    • userID

      private int userID
      The unique identifier for this user instance. Auto-generated during object creation.

  • Constructor Details

    • UserModel

      protected UserModel(String nric, String name, int age, String isMarried, String password, UserRole role)
      Protected constructor for initializing common user attributes. Called by constructors of concrete subclasses (ApplicantModel, HDBOfficerModel, HDBManagerModel). Enforces password hashing and initializes user state.
      Parameters:
      nric - The user's NRIC number.
      name - The user's name.
      age - The user's age.
      isMarried - A string indicating marital status ("Married" or "Single"). Case-insensitive.
      password - The user's chosen password in plaintext (will be hashed).
      role - The UserRole assigned to this user. Given by the subclasses.

  • Method Details

    • getNRIC

      public String getNRIC()
      Retrieves the user's NRIC number.
      Returns:
      The user's NRIC number.

    • getName

      public String getName()
      Retrieves the user's name.
      Returns:
      The user's name string.

    • getAge

      public int getAge()
      Retrieves the user's age.
      Returns:
      The user's age as an integer.

    • getMaritalStatus

      public Boolean getMaritalStatus()
      Retrieves the user's marital status.
      Returns:
      True if the user is married, false otherwise.

    • getUsersRole

      public UserRole getUsersRole()
      Retrieves the user's assigned role.
      Returns:
      The UserRole enum value representing the user's role.

    • getUserID

      public int getUserID()
      Retrieves the user's unique ID.
      Returns:
      The user's unique integer ID.

    • setPassword

      public void setPassword(String password)
      Sets the user's password. The provided plain text password will be securely hashed before storage. If hashing fails, the password remains unchanged.
      Parameters:
      password - The plain text password to set.

    • authenticate

      public void authenticate(String password) throws AuthenticationException
      Authenticates the user by comparing the provided plain text password against the stored hash.
      Parameters:
      password - The plain text password provided during login attempt.
      Throws:
      AuthenticationException - If the provided password does not match the stored hash.

    • hashPasswd

      private String hashPasswd(String plaintext)
      Hashes a plain text password using the SHA-256 algorithm and encodes it using Base64.
      Parameters:
      plaintext - The plain text password to hash.
      Returns:
      A Base64 encoded string representing the hashed password, or null if hashing fails.

    • getMenuOptions

      public abstract List<String> getMenuOptions()
      Abstract method to be implemented by concrete subclasses. Defines the specific menu options available to a user based on their role. This promotes polymorphism, allowing different user types to present different interfaces.
      Returns:
      A List of strings, where each string represents a menu option available to the user.

    • getProjectViewFilter

      public ProjectViewFilterModel getProjectViewFilter()
      Retrieves the user's project view filter preferences. Allows access to the encapsulated filter settings for this user.
      Returns:
      The ProjectViewFilterModel object associated with this user.
